display.title: Ancient Armor (Mage)
display.description: Drop a stack of Ancient Splinters, Pig Hide & Blaze Core onto a Reinforced Deepslate Block, along with an already Timmed piece of Armor to convert it to a new Ancient Trim [Required: 64x Ancient Splinters 1x Pig Hide 1x Blaze Core 1x Any Trimmed Armor Piece | Drop Craft With: Reinforced Deepslate]
